title: creating subfolders in Thunderbird
content:
05 August I have been using Thunderbird software for many years. I am currently using version 140.1.0

I have many subfolders set up under "Local Folders". I need to set up a new subfolder. The option for me to click on "File", "New Subfolder" at the top of the screen is now missing. How can I get that back, so that I can again create new subfolders?

Thank yuoou.

Connie Yanicka
creator: cyanicka46

title: unable to create subfolders under "Local Folders"
content:
05 August 2025 I have used Thunderbird software for many years to manage my e-mail. I am currently using version 140.1.0. Windows 11 OS. I have a gmail e-mail address.

I have many subfolders under my "Local Folders". I need to create a new subfolder. I am no longer able to click on "File" and then "New Subfolder" under Local Folders. I think there is an entire ribbon missing from the top of my Thunderbird window. How can I restore the option to click on "File", and then "New Subfolder, so I can create a new subfolder?

Thank you.

Connie Yanicka
creator: cyanicka46

title: The attachments in RSS subscription messages are magnet links, and I can't click or copy them.
content: I subscribed to RSS feeds on Thunderbird. After subscribing, the received messages have attachments, and these attachments are in the form of magnet links. I can't click on these links or copy them directly, yet this is exactly what I need. Please help resolve this issue.

title: mi da errore nell'importazione dei messaggi
content:
Ho esportato tutto da un thunderbird su un pc. Ora l'ho installato su un nuovo pc e mi ha importato tutto tranne la posta inviata, Se ritento l'importazione mi da l'errore che vedete in allegato. Tutta l'altra posta , compreso i due account ecc me li ha importati correttamente.

Come faccio ad importare solo la posta inviata?

Il file di backup è sui 20 GB.

Grazie

title: Thunderbird nevie vytvorit novu spravu
content:
Od urciteho okamihu Thunderbird nevie vytvorit novu spravu, po kliknuti na button alebo odkaz na novu spravu sa nic neudeje

Ostatne funkcionality funguju, da sa pouzit len doslu spravu upravit ako novu, lenze to si uchovava povodne nastavenia spravy a nie je to pre obycajneho uzivatela

Preinstalacia nepomohla

title: Thunderbird still syncing a disabled Google Workspace account
content:
I had a Google workspace account which is now disabled: "Your Google Account was disabled by your Google Workspace administrator. Contact your administrator for help. This account became unavailable on 15 Aug 2024."

I use Thunderbird to consolidate all my email addresses and it keeps asking me to enter credentials for a disabled account. I have removed the account from Thunderbird, as well as all the related contacts, but I still get a Google window to enter my credentials here:

https://accounts.google.com/v3/signin/identifier?opparams=%253F&dsh=S722672848%3A1754470878952574&client_id=406964657835-aq8lmia8j95dhl1a2bvharmfk3t1hgqj.apps.googleusercontent.com&login_hint=002-mt_0001%40002vendor.com&o2v=1&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost&response_type=code&scope=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.googleapis.com%2Fauth%2Fcarddav&service=lso&flowName=GeneralOAuthLite&continue=https%3A%2F%2Faccounts.google.com%2Fsignin%2Foauth%2Flegacy%2Fconsent%3F

Please help. Thanks.
creator: m.celine.grech

title: MOZILLA THUNDERBIRD START AFTER 20 SEC, FROM PREVIUS LAST AND LAST UPDATE (THIS MORNING)
content: This morning I updated Mozilla Thunderbird to the latest version, see attached image. When I open Thunderbird for 20 seconds I only see a full screen white image for at least twenty seconds, then the program starts normally and everything seems ok. In previous versions it never happened 100%. There is definitely a bug in this version. Hopefully we will have an update soon that will make everything okay again. I have been using this software for years without any problems, until now. Thank you. Rossano Zanga, SUI.
creator: wallaceegromit

title: Attachments
content:
Buenos días Recientemente he cambiado de equipo informático, y he notado lo siguiente:

En el anterior equipo, y para enviar un mail con un archivo adjunto, desde el explorador de Windows, hacía clic con el botón derecho sobre el archivo deseado, seleccionaba la opción “Enviar a…” “Destinatario de correo”, y se abría una nueva ventana de Thunderbir con el mensaje a enviar y el archivo ya adjunto, a la espera de añadir: destinatario, Asunto y texto del mensaje

Ahora no se me abre esta ventana y me invita a crear un perfil, que he creado con mis datos, pero la instancia que se me abre es la de Outlook.

He accedido a los programas predeterminados de Windows y he cambiado todo lo relacionado con el correo a Thunderbird, pero sigue sin funcionar

Qué me falta por hacer?

Muchas gracias

Un saludo Elias Granizo elias.granizo@gmail.com
creator: elias.granizo

title: Problema al usar varias cuentas
content:
Hola!

Estamos teniendo muchos problemas a la hora de agregar varias cuentas cuando antes se podia perfectamente.

Os explico.

Meto la cuenta hola@hola.com por ejemplo ahí sin problema, la puedo configurar manualmente y se añade sin problema, pero si voy a añadir otra cuenta para usar varios correos a la vez ahí se queda pillado y no deja agregar manualmente para configurar el servidor, no sabemos que hacer y esto hace que la gente de la oficina este sin poder usar varios correos a la vez,

Adjunto pantallazos.

Un saludo y gracias!
creator: soporte27

title: Thunderbird 141.0
content: Hello, I hope this message reaches you. I have a Mac operating on OS 10.15 .7. Ever since I upgraded my Thunderbird to the 141.0 version, two things happen: 1) the fans of my Mac start ventilating very soon (and the battery starts going down) 2) when I quit Thunderbird , everything goes back to normal , but 10 seconds after, a window opens reporting an unexpected shut down. I usually click OK , but when I click "report" , nothing happens. Thanks for your help J.C.
